      • setTile

        public void setTile(int x,
           int y,
           int tileID)
        Description copied from interface: Map
        This should only be used by the level editor team. People wishing to generate Maps (Dungeons, etc) should simply call the constructor, not modifying the Map after construction. In future, modifications to a 'live' map will be processed by the server and distributed to clients. This will lift the above restriction. Alters the Tile at the given coordinates.
        Specified by:
        setTile in interface Map

      • setTile

        public void setTile(int x,
           int y,
           Tile tile)
        Description copied from interface: Map
        This should only be used by the level editor team. People wishing to generate Maps (Dungeons, etc) should simply call the constructor, not modifying the Map after construction. In future, modifications to a 'live' map will be processed by the server and distributed to clients. This will lift the above restriction. Alters the Tile at the given coordinates.
        Specified by:
        setTile in interface Map
